id.comment: Select stmt that is followed within while container

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows* (9, s)

id.comment: Select stmt follows last stmt in container

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows (11, s)

id.comment: Select stmt followed by first stmt in container

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows (s, 5)
if ifs; stmt s; Select s such that Follows* (ifs, s)

id.comment: Select stmt followed by while statement

query.querystr: while w; stmt s; Select s such that Follows (s, w)

id.comment: Select all stmts if there is stmt followed by while statement

query.querystr: while w; stmt s; stmt s1; Select s1 such that Follows (s, w)
